segments.text: I see the two children, busy with their own secret mission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is scaling that wobbly stool, reaching for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's really stretching himself out, almost like an acrobat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool looks incredibly unstable; it could tip over any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe they're being so bold right behind the adult.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is practically vibrating with anticipation, her hand outstretched.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're clearly collaborating on this cookie heist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a classic childhood caper, isn't it?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn't fall and hurt himself or break the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're certainly determined to get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is going to be quite a mess if they're caught or if the stool gives way.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me smile, their innocent defiance.
segments.speaker: PAR
